name: Shoots McGee
description:
This Game is a Simple 2D Top Down Shooter I made as my first project in college, It isn't the best thing in the world however I'm proud of the way it came along and came out, 

the whole point of the game is to clear the level you are in and then move onto the next, however it is also possible to run from all the enemies directly into the next levels until you finish the game and escape from all the people who want to test your superior shooting ability.

as Shoots McGee, everyone in the world knows your name and is after your Title as Worlds Best Marksman. no matter the weapon you wield, running and gunning through enemies in all sorts of different levels until you finally reach a place you can find peace.
